data.name: Pamali: Indonesian Folklore Horror - The Little Devil
data.detailed_description:
Access to this DLC (The Little Devil) will be granted upon release (Q2 2019).

Explore the old Javanese Dutch-colonial mansion to find the inheritance Putri’s grandfather left for her and reveal the secret behind the grandfather’s wealth. Does it really come from his hard work or maybe, a result from a supernatural entity who helped him in the past?

A young university student is notified that her grandfather leaves her a will before he died. In hopes of gaining money for her father's medication, she decides to go to her grandfather's old mansion in her hometown to claim for the inheritance. Ignoring her father’s words to stay away from everything relates to the grandfather, she insists to go out of desperation. Along the way, she also tries to reveal the secret that lies behind her mother’s death and what has happened to her mother’s family. This trip will be the answers to all the questions she has and perhaps, a way to get her out from her financial issues.

Experience Putri’s journey in her grandfather’s old mansion through various choices: to get the inheritance to support her father’s medication, reveal the past, make another fortunes, or just to keep what she already has.

Features:

  • Atmospheric horror in an old Javanese Dutch-colonial mansion.
  • Immersive mystery-solving experience.
  • Multiple endings depending on the choices player made during the playthrough.
  • Unique Indonesian value regarding gaining wealth and success.

data.short_description: Experience Putri’s journey to get the inheritance in her grandfather’s old Javanese Dutch-colonial mansion while revealing what has happened to her mother’s family in the past.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7200U CPU @ 2.50Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

subs.option_text: Pamali: Indonesian Folklore Horror - The Little Devil - 3,99€

content_descriptors.notes:
Content is generally suitable for ages 17 and up. May contain intense violence, blood and gore, sexual content and/or strong language.

•    Animated Blood - Discolored and/or unrealistic depictions of blood
•    Blood - Depictions of blood
•    Crude Humor - Depictions or dialogue involving vulgar antics, including "bathroom" humor
•    Fantasy Violence - Violent actions of a fantasy nature, involving human or non-human characters in situations easily distinguishable from real life
•    Intense Violence - Graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict. May involve extreme and/or realistic blood, gore, weapons and depictions of human injury and death
•    Language - Mild to moderate use of profanity
•    Strong Language - Explicit and/or frequent use of profanity
•    Tobacco Reference - Reference to and/or images of tobacco products
•    Drug Use - References to the use of medication drugs.
